doc: Robin Tunney https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robin_Tunney 1 Robin Tunney (born June 19, 1972) is an American actress. She is known for her role as Teresa Lisbon on the television series The Mentalist (2008–15), and her portrayal of Veronica Donovan on the first two seasons of Prison Break (2005–06). Tunney made her film debut in the 1992 comedy Encino Man. She came to prominence with leading roles in the cult films Empire Records (1995) and The Craft (1996). She received the Volpi Cup for Best Actress, as well as Gotham and Independent Spirit nominations for her performance in Niagara, Niagara (1997). She had leading roles in the action-thriller films End of Days (1999), Supernova and Vertical Limit (both 2000). In 2006, she earned critical acclaim for her portrayal of a victim of sexual assault in the independent drama Open Window. Her other notable film appearances include Cherish, The Secret Lives of Dentists (both 2002), The In-Laws (2003), Hollywoodland (2006), August, The Burning Plain (both 2008), Passenger Side (2009), and Looking Glass (2018). Robin_Tunney ( born June_19_,_1972 ) is an_American_actress . She is_known for her_role as Teresa_Lisbon on the_television_series The_Mentalist_(_2008 – 15_) , and her_portrayal of Veronica_Donovan on the_first_two_seasons of Prison_Break_(_2005 – 06_) . Tunney made her_film_debut in the_1992_comedy_Encino_Man . She came to prominence with leading_roles in the_cult_films Empire_Records_(_1995 ) and The_Craft_(_1996_) . She received the_Volpi_Cup_for_Best_Actress , as_well_as Gotham and Independent_Spirit nominations for her_performance in Niagara , Niagara_(_1997_) . She had_leading roles in the_action-thriller_films_End of Days (_1999_)_,_Supernova_and_Vertical_Limit ( both_2000_) . Her_other_notable_film_appearances include Cherish , The_Secret_Lives of Dentists ( both 2002_) , The_In-Laws_(_2003_) , Hollywoodland_(_2006_)_,_August_, The_Burning_Plain ( both_2008_)_,_Passenger_Side_(_2009_) , and Looking Glass ( 2018_) . . She is known for her role as {PERSON[Teresa_Lisbon]} on the television series The Mentalist ( 2008 – 15 ) , and her portrayal of {PERSON[Veronica_Donovan]} on the first two seasons of Prison Break ( 2005 – 06 ) . {PERSON[Tunney]} made her film debut in the 1992 comedy Encino Man . She came to prominence with leading roles in the cult films Empire Records ( 1995 ) and The Craft ( 1996 ) . She received the Volpi Cup for Best Actress , as well as {LOCATION[Gotham]} and Independent Spirit nominations for her performance in {LOCATION[Niagara]} , {LOCATION[Niagara]} ( 1997 ) . She had leading roles in the action-thriller films End of Days ( 1999 ) , {PERSON[Supernova]} and {PERSON[Vertical_Limit]} ( both 2000 ) . In 2006 , she earned critical acclaim for her portrayal of a victim of sexual assault in the independent drama Open Window . Her other notable film appearances include Cherish , The Secret Lives of Dentists ( both 2002 ) , The In-Laws ( 2003 ) , {LOCATION[Hollywoodland]} ( 2006 ) , August , The Burning Plain ( both 2008 ) , Passenger Side ( 2009 ) , and Looking Glass ( 2018 ) . {PERSON[Robin_Tunney]} ( born June 19 , 1972 ) is an {MISC[American]} actress . She is known for her role as {PERSON[Teresa_Lisbon]} on the television series The Mentalist ( 2008 – 15 ) , and her portrayal of {PERSON[Veronica_Donovan]} on the first two seasons of Prison Break ( 2005 – 06 ) . {PERSON[Tunney]} made her film debut in the 1992 comedy {MISC[Encino_Man]} . She came to prominence with leading roles in the cult films {MISC[Empire_Records]} ( 1995 ) and {PERSON[The_Craft]} ( 1996 ) . She received the {MISC[Volpi_Cup]} for {ORGANIZATION[Best_Actress]} , as well as {LOCATION[Gotham]} and Independent Spirit nominations for her performance in {LOCATION[Niagara]} , {LOCATION[Niagara]} ( 1997 ) . She had leading roles in the action-thriller films End of Days ( 1999 ) , {ORGANIZATION[Supernova]} and {PERSON[Vertical_Limit]} ( both 2000 ) . In 2006 , she earned critical acclaim for her portrayal of a victim of sexual assault in the independent drama {MISC[Open_Window]} . Her other notable film appearances include {PERSON[Cherish]} , {ORGANIZATION[The_Secret_Lives_of_Dentists]} ( both 2002 ) , The {MISC[In-Laws]} ( 2003 ) , {PERSON[Hollywoodland]} ( 2006 ) , August , {ORGANIZATION[The_Burning_Plain]} ( both 2008 ) , {ORGANIZATION[Passenger_Side]} ( 2009 ) , and {PERSON[Looking_Glass]} ( 2018 ) . {PERSON[Robin_Tunney]} ( born {DATE[June_19_,_1972]} ) is an American actress . She is known for her role as {PERSON[Teresa_Lisbon]} on the television series The Mentalist ( {DATE[2008]} – 15 ) , and her portrayal of {PERSON[Veronica_Donovan]} on the first two seasons of Prison Break ( {DATE[2005]} – 06 ) . Tunney made her film debut in the {DATE[1992]} comedy {LOCATION[Encino]} Man . She came to prominence with leading roles in the cult films {ORGANIZATION[Empire_Records]} ( {DATE[1995]} ) and The Craft ( {DATE[1996]} ) . She received the {ORGANIZATION[Volpi_Cup_for_Best_Actress]} , as well as {LOCATION[Gotham]} and Independent Spirit nominations for her performance in {LOCATION[Niagara]} , Niagara ( {DATE[1997]} ) . She had leading roles in the action-thriller films End of Days ( {DATE[1999]} ) , Supernova and Vertical Limit ( both {DATE[2000]} ) . In {DATE[2006]} , she earned critical acclaim for her portrayal of a victim of sexual assault in the independent drama Open Window . Her other notable film appearances include {LOCATION[Cherish]} , The Secret Lives of Dentists ( both 2002 ) , The In-Laws ( 2003 ) , Hollywoodland ( 2006 ) , {DATE[August]} , The Burning Plain ( both 2008 ) , Passenger Side ( {DATE[2009]} ) , and Looking Glass ( 2018 ) .
